TopicTitle: Makijg tutorials for aesthetic pleasing craft

Articles.Content: Will make it on the wiki may take a while to respond and will tell you if I will make it. It MUST be a real life craft or a planned one.
I'm sorry LABHOUSE, but I don't know what you're trying to say. Could you clarify, please?
Well, at least the mod was polite.
I believe he's trying to say that he is making tutorials on the wiki for real-life craft. He takes request for real-life ships, but it may take a while for him to respond to requests.
With regard to some removed posts: either address the subject of the thread or skip to the next one. No one benefits from forum members being rude to each other.

I believe he's trying to say that he is making tutorials on the wiki for real-life craft. He takes request for real-life ships, but it may take a while for him to respond to requests.

Exactly was that not what I said badly? I have already made some for a 747, shuttle, progress, falcon nine, falcon heavy.
